嫡.definition: (bound form) of or by the wife, as opposed to a concubine (contrasted with 庶[shu4])

嫡傳.definition: handed down in a direct line from the founder

嫡出.definition: born of the wife (i.e. not of a concubine)

嫡堂.definition: having the same paternal grandfather but different father

嫡子.definition: son, esp. the eldest son, of the wife (contrasted with 庶子[shu4 zi3])

嫡母.definition: father's wife (term used by the children of a concubine)

嫡系.definition: direct line of descent; under one's personal command; school or faction passing on faithfully one's doctrine
